snippet: At a rally in Harlem, Carl E. Heastie, the first African-American speaker of the New York Assembly, cited reforming the criminal justice system as one of his goals.
abstract: Carl E Heastie, first African-American to become speaker of New York Assembly, says he will leverage post to help ordinary black citizens.
lead_paragraph: At a rally in Harlem, Carl E. Heastie, the first African-American speaker of the New York Assembly, cited reforming the criminal justice system as one of his goals.

headline.main: New York’s New Assembly Leader Vows to Aid Blacks
headline.print_headline: New Assembly Leader Vows to Aid Blacks
